EmailTemplate.name: PMC Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to PMC! Here are the next steps.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations!
You’re on your way to grow your business and track your marketing.
Here are some easy next steps to get you and your team up and running with Partner Marketing Center (PMC)!
Use This Easy to Follow Set-Up Checklist Follow these simple steps in this Admin-specific training on Partner Learning Camp to ensure to maximize Partner Marketing Center for your team.You’ll learn how to set up your marketing and reporting tools and more!! Go to Admin PMC Training - https://partnerlearningcamp.salesforce.com/login?ec=302&startURL=%2Fs%2Fbrowse-catalog
Connect Your Team With These Self-Guided Courses These quick, easy to follow courses show your team how to use PMC content to market your business and quickly set up reports for better lead insights. Go to Marketing/Sales PMC Training - https://partnerlearningcamp.salesforce.com/login?ec=302&startURL=%2Fs%2Fbrowse-catalog
Join Us on Chatter Stay up-to-date on the latest Partner Marketing Center features, newest content updates, marketing tips, and training. Chatter is also a great way to connect with other PMC users and subject matter experts! Visit PMC Chatter - https://partners.salesforce.com/_ui/core/chatter/groups/GroupProfilePage?g=0F93A000000LgVm
That’s it!
Cheers, The PMC Team
